name: Lasagna
author: Carol Peters

ingredients.name: (28 oz.) can whole tomatoes, quartered and drained or equal tomato juice/sauce
(6 oz.) cans tomato paste Mushrooms, if desired

instructions: Saute beef in oil until browned, stirring to crumble meat. Stir in garlic, parsley, 1 teaspoon salt, tomatoes and tomato paste. Simmer uncovered for 45 to 50 minutes or until thickened; set aside. Cook noodles according to package directions; drain. Combine cottage cheese, eggs, 1 teaspoon salt, pepper and Parmesan cheese; mix well. Layer 1/2 of noodles, cottage cheese mixture, Mozzarella and meat sauce in greased 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Repeat layers; bake at 375Â° for 30 minutes.
